mapper.select: select u.* , b.role_id role_id , b.role_no role_no , b.name name, b.description description ,b.function_id , b.function_no, b.function_url,b.function_name from user_c u left join ( select a.user_id user_id, r.role_id role_id , r.role_no role_no , r.name name , r.description description ,r.function_id function_id, r.function_no function_no , r.function_url function_url , r.function_name function_name from user_role_c a left join ( select r.* , f.function_id function_id ,f.function_no function_no , f.function_url function_url , f.function_name function_name from role_c r left join ( select * from role_function_c )rf on r.role_id = rf.role_id left join ( select * from function_c )f on rf.function_id = f.function_id )r on a.role_id = r.role_id )b on u.user_id = b.user_id where u.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND u.USER_NO = #{userName} and u.PASSWORD = #{password}

select u.user_id user_id , u.user_no user_no,x.user_role_id user_role_id ,x.role_id role_id ,x.name name from user_c u left join ( select ur.user_id user_id,ur.user_role_id user_role_id , r.role_id role_id , r.name name from user_role_c ur left join ( select * from role_c ) r on ur.role_id =r.role_id ) x on x.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
